description: Five Years Ago This week in 2019, Colorado’s net neutrality bill was heading to the governor’s desk while Mitch McConnell was promising a House net neutrality bill would never get past the Senate. The UK proposed a ridiculous plan to fine internet companies for vaguely defined “harmful content” while the European Parliament was moving forward […]
title: This Week In Techdirt History: April 7th – 13th

description: A couple of years back, Mike wrote about a lawsuit brought against Paramount Pictures over its Top Gun movies. There were several things that colluded to make this lawsuit a thing, as Mike laid out. First was the mess that is copyright termination rights and the second is movie studios’ habit for licensing factual articles […]
title: Court Rules For Paramount In Lawsuit  Over ‘Top Gun’ Movies
